final_recap:
DEV: Rance's wild Mage-Gift awakened during bandit attack; obliterated Lisle village; Companion Senta Chose him; red robes found hidden under bandit clothingâ€”organized attack suggesting Karse; prisoner-taking indicates blood magic revival; four-day ride to Haven completed; arrived Haven; Healers alerted to wild talent danger; reported Lisle attack to Circle; complete mind-merge with Talia confirmed; Mage-Gift confirmed; quartered at Healer's cottage; Kyril to contact bordering nations; Talia arrived at dawn; requested private discussion; consummated relationship with Rance; discovered preference for sexual submission/degradation; established semi-official partnership (known to Circle/Selenay only).
PEND: Rance's memories of attack still blocked; Mage-Gift training without teachers; fate of Lisle prisoners unknown; Karse blood magic threat assessment needed; red-robed attackers may return; Rance's Gift untrained, dangerous; scope of threat beyond Valderan; political ramifications of two people with Queen's Own knowledge; Talia must report to Selenay bearing physical evidence of coupling; formal arrangement yet to be presented to Queen.

all_entities.c: Obliterated by Rance's awakening wild Gift during bandit attack
